post.title: AI age Discrimination
post.excerpt: In Mobley v. Workday, job applicant over 40 who says he was rejected over 80 times by companies using Workday’s AI tools. He claims their algorithm systematically filtered out older applicants. https://x.com/thejobchick/status/1952365445388067046?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
